mapper.select:
SELECT n.NOT_OPR_CODE , n.NOT_OPR_SEP , n.BEGIN_DATE , n.END_DATE , n.CONTENTS_CONTENTS , n.USERS_CODE , n.EQM_CODE , e.EQM_NAME , u.USERS_NAME FROM NOT_OPR n JOIN EQM e ON n.EQM_CODE = e.EQM_CODE JOIN USERS u ON n.USERS_CODE = u.USERS_CODE
ORDER BY 1

where.if: (n.NOT_OPR_CODE LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR n.EQM_CODE LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR e.EQM_NAME LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR u.USERS_NAME LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%')
AND (TRUNC(#{noneDate}) >= n.BEGIN_DATE AND TRUNC(#{noneDate}) <= n.END_DATE OR n.END_DATE is null)

mapper.select: SELECT USERS_CODE , USERS_NAME , POSITION , LOCAL_TEL , USERS_STATUS FROM USERS ORDER BY 1

SELECT EQM_CODE , EQM_NAME , MODEL_NAME , MAKER , PURPOSE , INSTALL_PLACE , BUY_COMPANY , BUY_PRICE , BUY_DATE , DUMP_DATE , CHECK_CYCLE , LAST_CHECK_DATE , EQM_STATUS , OPR_STATUS FROM EQM WHERE EQM_STATUS = 'ES1' OR EQM_STATUS = 'ES2' ORDER BY 1
